name: Journey
description:
Journey is an indie adventure game co-developed by Thatgamecompany and Santa Monica Studio 
and published by Sony Computer Entertainment.

name: Firewatch
description:
Firewatch is an adventure game developed by Campo Santo 
and published by the developer in partnership with Panic.

name: Doom
description:
Doom is a first-person shooter video game developed by id Software 
and published by Bethesda Softworks. It was released worldwide on May 2016

name: NFS: Heat
description:
Need for Speed Heat is a racing video game developed by Ghost Games 
and published by Electronic Arts for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One.

name: GTA V
description:
Grand Theft Auto V is a 2013 action-adventure game developed by Rockstar North 
and published by Rockstar Games.

name: Titanfall 2
description: Titanfall 2 is a first-person shooter video game, developed by Respawn Entertainment and published by Electronic Arts. It is a sequel to 2014's Titanfall,
